exam.title: Exam
exam.consentText: I hereby confirm with my full name, representing my signature, that I have read the conditions of participation and will adhere to them for the duration of the exam.
exam.falseName: Entered name is incorrect. Please try again!

validation.startAndEndMustBeSet: The start and end date must be set for the exam
validation.atLeastOneExercisePerExerciseGroup: All exercise groups must have at least one exercise.
validation.numberOfExercisesInExamNotSet: The number of exercises in the exam is not set.
validation.tooFewExerciseGroups: The number of exercise groups is too small.
validation.tooManyMandatoryExerciseGroups: The number of mandatory exercise groups is too large.

examScores.title: Exam Scores
examScores.examResultSummary: {{ exercisesLength }} exercise groups, {{ studentsLength }} registered students

examParticipation.connected: Your answers will be saved every 30s.
examParticipation.disconnected: You are disconnected. Please check your Internet connection. You can continue working, but you need to be connected in order to save changes!
examParticipation.disconnectedCodeEditorAndOfflineIDE: You are disconnected. Please check your Internet connection. You can still work offline by cloning the repository.
examParticipation.disconnectedCodeEditorNoOfflineIDE: You are disconnected. Please reconnect in order to continue working in the online code editor.
examParticipation.disconnectedNoCodeEditor: You are disconnected. Please check your Internet connection.
examParticipation.waitForStart: Please wait until the exam "{{ title }}" begins.
examParticipation.noStudentExam: You are not registered for the exam {{ examTitle }}. Please contact your instructor.
examParticipation.saveSubmissionError: Your changes could not be saved! Please make sure that you are online and try saving again.
examParticipation.pendingChanges: All unsaved changes will be lost when leaving the exam! Are you sure that you want to continue?
